example.name: autogen1
example.text: Topping the cheese stunt , on another typical evening of fun on `` Wetten Dass , '' a contestant won a bet with the show 's host , Thomas Gottschalk , that he could identify 300 German dialects over the telephone .
example.arg: with the show 's host , Thomas Gottschalk ,
that he could identify 300 German dialects over the telephone
